class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.fake_sleep_dep_interface.FakeSleepDepriverInterface(port='/dev/ttyUSB0')[source]¶

Bases: ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.SleepDepriverInterface

Class implementing the interface to the sleep depriver module, which rotate tubes to sleep deprive animals.

Parameters:port (str or None) – the serial port on which the device is plugged. If None automatic port detection is attempted.
class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.fake_sleep_dep_interface.FakeSleepDepriverSubProcess(queue, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.SleepDepriverSubProcess

Class to run delegate sleep deprivation connection (SleepDepriverConnection). To a parallel process. This way, the execution of the sleep depriver connection instructions are non-blocking.

Parameters:
  • queue (JoinableQueue) – A multiprocessing queue to pass instructions.
  • args – additional arguments
  • kwargs – additional keyword arguments
Returns:

ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.interfaces module¶

class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.interfaces.BaseInterface[source]¶

Bases: object

A template class to interface hardware. It must implement two methods: _warm_up() and interact() Typically, several BaseInteractor will share a single hardware interface. When possible, hardware interfaces are also responsible for checking, at initialisation, that hardware is reachable. :return:

interact(**kwargs)¶

Method to request hardware interface to interact with the physical world. Typically called by an BaseInteractor.

Parameters:kwargs – keywords arguments
class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.interfaces.DefaultInterface[source]¶

Bases: object

A default dummy interface that does nothing.

interact()[source]¶

ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface module¶

exception ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.NoValidPortError[source]¶

Bases: serial.serialutil.SerialException

class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.SimpleLynxMotionConnection(port=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to connect and abstract the Lynx Motion servo controller.

Parameters:port – the serial port to use. Automatic detection if None.
move_to_angle(idx, angle=0.0, time=1000)¶

Move a given servo to a given angle in a given time.

Parameters:
  • idx (int) – the number of the servo to be moved
  • angle (int) – the angle (between 0 and 180) to move to
  • time (int) – the time it takes to go from the original angle to the new one (in ms)
Returns:
class ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.SleepDepriverConnection(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: ethoscope.hardware.interfaces.sleep_depriver_interface.SimpleLynxMotionConnection

Class to connect to the sleep depriver module.

Parameters:
  • args – additional arguments to be passed to the base class
  • kwargs – additional keyword arguments to be passed to the base class
deprive(channel, dt=500, margin=5)[source]¶

Sleep deprive an animal by rotating its tube.

Parameters:
  • channel – The chanel to use (i.e. the number of the servo)
  • dt (int) – The time it takes to go from 0 to 180 degrees (inms)
  • margin – the number of degree to pad rotation. eg 5 -> rotation from 5 -> 175
Typechannel:

int
warm_up()[source]¶

Warm up the module. That is move each tube three times in order to check setup and that no servo has failed.

Bases: multiprocessing.process.Process

Class to run delegate sleep deprivation connection (SleepDepriverConnection). To a parallel process. This way, the execution of the sleep depriver connection instructions are non-blocking.

  • args – additional arguments
